bari.report.non-canonical-scale: Bone Array Rotation Influence: non-canonical armature scale
bari.report.non-canonical-scale:descript: Inserted fake parent bones have been placed at unexpected position. This may be caused by non-canonical armature scale (like 100). Tweak Offset Distance to more small value if not working properly.
bari.inspector.close-loop:tooltip: Assumes that the first and last elements of Sources are connected
bari.inspector.offset-distance:tooltip: Y-axis distance from original root transform
bari.inspector.influence:tooltip: Global Weight to set in Rotation Constraint
bari.inspector.replace-bones:tooltip: Sets Sources from direct children of this GameObject
bari.inspector.update-influence:tooltip: Sets all influence values of Sources with the slider value on left
eepi.inspector.vrc-constraint:tooltip: Use VRC Aim Constraint instead of Unity's one. Must be used with EyePointer v1.2 or later.
eepi.inspector.dummy-bones:tooltip: Insert dummy eye bones between head and default eye bones.
eepi.inspector.fx-layer:tooltip: Rewrite armature paths in EyePointer AnimationClip-s. Enable only if needed.
eepi.report.placeholder-inserted: Enhanced EyePointer Installer: Eye Look enabled with placeholder settings
eepi.report.placeholder-inserted:descrip: Eye Look in Avatar Descriptor has been enabled with placeholder (i.e. VRChat still won't move your actual eye bones). This is a workaround for unexpected behavior in specific avatar states.
eepi.report.prefab-moved: Enhanced EyePointer Installer: Eye Pointer prefab has been moved to avatar root
eepi.report.prefab-moved:description: The prefab must be placed in avatar root to work properly. In most case, this process does not affect any other avatar functionality (unless animations refer the prefab).
eepi.report.aps-detected: Enhanced EyePointer Installer: Applied workaround for Avatar Pose System
eepi.report.aps-detected:description: To avoid interference with Eye Pointer system, some components generated by Avatar Pose System have been disabled.
ahbsm.inspector.append-regex: Append canceling defintions according to Regices
pbfctt.report.too-many-targets: PB Finger Collider Transfer Target: Too many targets ({0})
pbfctt.report.too-many-targets:descripti: At most 6 targets can be placed in an avatar (ones for index fingers are preserved on hands). Rest targets will be ignored.
ahnb.report.unreadable-mask: Specified mask texture cannot be read
ahnb.report.unreadable-mask:description: Enable Read/Write in import settings to use this mask texture properly.
asv.inspector.ignored-armature-help: This Armature will be ignored by Avatar Status Validator.
asv.report.suspicious-unmerged-armature: Avatar Status Validator: MA Merge Armature may be missing
asv.report.suspicious-unmerged-armature:: If intended, please attach Zatools Ignored Armature.
asv.report.suspicious-unmerged-armature-: Avatar Status Validator: MA Merge Armature may be missing
Detected an armature which has non-standard structure. You can ignore this message if there is no problem.
mbsi.drop-area: Drag and drop AnimationClip assets here
